response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. We are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is a limited-time offer, and we encourage you to consider this opportunity to own a piece that is both valuable and exclusive. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 1200000}
